title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1437/87 of 25 May 1987 suspending advance fixing of export refunds for cereals
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1437/87
of 25 May 1987
suspending advance fixing of export refunds for cereals
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Advance fixing of the export refund for the products referred to in Article 1 (d) of Regulation (EEC) No 2727/75 and for products exported in the form of goods covered by Annex B of Regulation (EEC) No 2727/75 is hereby suspended from 26 to 28 May 1987 inclusive.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 26 May 1987.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 May 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
